name: Isogram
description: Determine if a word is an isogram (no repeating letters)
prompt: Create a function `is_isogram(string)` that determines if a word or phrase is an isogram. An isogram is a word or phrase without a repeating letter, however spaces and hyphens are allowed to appear multiple times. The check should be case-insensitive. Place the implementation in src/core/isogram.py
